You know who was also purple? Thanos.
And we AAAAAALL know how that turned out.
And if you don't then go see Endgame right now.

This contest isn't very fair if you think about it. Consider the following:

* Only missions award points
* Points awarded increase each week so every house has the chance for a comeback
* Most players will probably only play enough to unlock the big reward quests and wont care about the 100xp quests after. 
So technically the team that has the most last minute slackers gets the most points per mission. Sure the missions are infinite but most people probably only play enough to get the good mission rewards. I bet every week there will be a different winner because of this and United will be dead last at the end.
{{sticker:sg-janna}}

United over here role playing saying "come together and lets work together...." {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}  Disgusting!  Cant rely on anybody but your own skill. I'm single handedly carrying the purple people eaters. :D

Rely on your own skill, but don't dismiss your team. Work with what you have. If you say that they just feed or something you are taking away from your ability to learn and focus on your own mistakes. Do that, and your Graves and Ekko winrates will rise above 41% and 52% no problem :). Your job as jg is to help your laners succeed, not flame em and try to 1v5. But Warband is the best no doubt >=3 (Same with mid, roaming is essential).
Come on Faceless! We can do it!
